title: I am chuffed.
content:
Shocked!

To find my name on the list of most frequent posters. What will people think? They will think I am some sort of person who posts things on the Internet. THAT is what they will think!

(actually, secretly, I'm a little chuffed... Odd, eh?)

Happy New 2008.

R
author: russellm

comments.content:
You, Mister Magoo! ;^) I know the kind of person you are---you're one of those people who posts things on the internet!

I was just "having fun" helping some people out in the critique forums when my name suddenly broke onto the list. The change in user habits over xmas altered the fabric of reality at Typophile. From there it was a matter of chasing after Chris and Stewf. I got stuck into the Typowiki too.

Happy 2008. It's just amazing how fair people can be.

j a m e s

_Shocked!_

"Mister Kincaide! I'm _shocked!"_

j a m e s

What does "chuffed" mean?

Sharon
I made it on for the first time too. I took a screen shot.

chuffed adj generally happy with life. You can also get away with saying you are "unchuffed" or "dischuffed" if something gets your back up. Make sure you only use this word in the correct tense and familiarise yourself with the meaning of the word "chuff" too.

for more see [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122123716/http:/english2american.com/dictionary/c.html)

Thanks, Sean.

I would have thought exactly the opposite, similar to chafed. :-)

Sharon
Sean, great link -- I have bookmarked it. Thanks!
"Well chuffed" my transplanted friends from across the pond say.

**chuffed**  
dechuffed  
dischuffed  
disenchufflement  
enchuffed  
enchufflement  
rechuffed  
unchuffed

j a m e s

Overchuffed  
Outchuffed

:-)

Sharon

Ooh! I like dischuffed.

I'll be using that one.

-=®=-

My favorites...

"I am rather disenchuffled right now..."

_overchuffed_

"That bloke is way overchuffed."

:-)

Careful! you guys are headed to addiction! (followed by xtreme chufflitus):-)

ChrisL

misunderchuffed for shure

I'm starting to see how you guys made the top posters list.

;-)

Aw, I can't beat that Chris :^)

The chuffalogical chuffacity of this thread has well chuffocated my cerebral chufftex.

Echuff is echuff!

ROTFLMAO!

I chuff hard for the money, Arbo! ;-D

Chuffapendous one, Paul!

ChrisL
Antidisestablishchuffmentarianism rules....
Linda, I thought you were a Chuffarian.

I can fully see eliason's point, hihi....

Great wordplay, fellows :-)
Zen Chuffarian, actually: can't you tell by my dreads? :-)
Chufftacular!
What mischuff. tsk tsk.

Dischuffed Sans

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122123716im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chuffed_5647.jpg)

-=®=-
have a CHUFFED new year!
We can change the name of Typophile to Chuffleboard.

Joe and Jared might start fistichuffs with you for that suggestion, Sharon :-)

ChrisL
Careful, Chris, or I'll dig out those fur handchuffs you gave me.... ;-)

Then I'll take back the chuffing dish I gave you :-P

ChrisL
I'd rather trade it for an antique Victorian chuffbox I saw on Antiques Roadshow. ;-)

That Victorian antique is available in Chuffalger Square.

ChrisL
Book me a room at the Dorchuffster Hotel and we can have a chuff of tea as well.

_We can change the name of Typophile to Chuffleboard._

Just as long as no-one chuffles off this mortal coil.

You are inchufferable, Ricardo!

ChrisL

Since I'm going to be a millionaire soon thanks to the Chuffinghouse Chufflisher's Sweepstakes. I felt it only right that I spend that money on a trip to Chuffingham Palace and have white Chuffles and tea with her majesty.

Honestly though, If we're about to chuffle off this mortal coil, no point getting ourselves worked up into a chuff. I'd rather go chuffed and mounted anyway.

In more serious news, I took the liberty of adding [Chuffed](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122123716/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Chuffed) to our illustrious [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20141122123716/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Terminology).

It seemed only chuffed.

I am sad and disheartened... And very, _very_ sorry. I come to this site in the hope that your immense collective smartitude will be elevating for me, only to find that I have dragged you down to my level.

Dischuffedly,  
Russell

@\<|:¬p

chuff it up

_only to find that I have dragged you down to my level_

Don't fret, Russell -- all is not chuffed... Er, that is... Oh, never chuffing mind!

;-)
